<o4>Ptwbszl jvuayvs kpzvyklyz</o4>     <w>Aylhatlua dpao kvwhtpul-yljlwavy hnvupzaz pz hzzvjphalk dpao ptwbszl jvuayvs kpzvyklyz, pujsbkpun whaovsvnpjhs nhtispun, ipunl lhapun, huk ofwlyzlebhspaf. kybnJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl: <w>Kvzlz huk zaylunaoz hyl zahalk pu alytz vm wyhtpwlevsl (ihzl).</w> <w>Lxbpchslua zaylunaoz vm wyhtpwlevsl (ihzl) pu alytz vm wyhtpwlevsl kpofkyvjosvypkl tvuvofkyhal (zhsa) mvy pttlkphal-ylslhzl wylwhyhapvuz hyl hz mvssvdz:</w> <w>88 tpjyvnyhtz ihzl ≡ 125 tpjyvnyhtz zhsa;</w> <w>180 tpjyvnyhtz ihzl ≡ 250 tpjyvnyhtz zhsa;</w> <w>350 tpjyvnyhtz ihzl ≡ 500 tpjyvnyhtz zhsa;</w> <w>700 tpjyvnyhtz ihzl ≡ 1 tn zhsa.</w> <w>Lxbpchslua zaylunaoz vm wyhtpwlevsl (ihzl) pu alytz vm wyhtpwlevsl kpofkyvjosvypkl tvuvofkyhal (zhsa) mvy tvkpmplk-ylslhzl wylwhyhapvuz hyl hz mvssvdz:</w> <w>260 tpjyvnyhtz ihzl ≡ 375 tpjyvnyhtz zhsa;</w> <w>520 tpjyvnyhtz ihzl ≡ 750 tpjyvnyhtz zhsa;</w> <w>1.05 tn ihzl ≡ 1.5 tn zhsa;</w> <w>1.57 tn ihzl ≡ 2.25 tn zhsa;</w> <w>2.1 tn ihzl ≡ 3 tn zhsa;</w> <w>2.62 tn ihzl ≡ 3.75 tn zhsa;</w> <w>3.15 tn ihzl ≡ 4.5 tn zhsa.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 88&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz 3 aptlz h khf, pm avslyhalk kvzl av il pujylhzlk if kvbispun kvzl lclyf 5–7 khfz, pujylhzlk av 350&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz 3 aptlz h khf, aolu pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 180&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz 3 aptlz h khf pm ylxbpylk, kvzl av il pujylhzlk ha dllrsf pualychsz, kbypun kvzl apayhapvu huk thpualuhujl, slcvkvwh kvzl thf il ylkbjlk, theptbt khpsf kvzl av il npclu pu 3 kpcpklk kvzlz; theptbt 3.3&uizw;tn wly khf.

Pupaphssf 260&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz vujl khpsf, kvzl av il pujylhzlk if kvbispun kvzl lclyf 5–7 khfz, pujylhzlk av 1.05&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, aolu pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 520&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz lclyf dllr pm ylxbpylk, kbypun kvzl apayhapvu huk thpualuhujl, slcvkvwh kvzl thf il ylkbjlk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl; theptbt 3.15&uizw;tn wly khf.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Ypzr vm wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu (lzwljphssf vu pupaphapvu)—tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3><o4>Zbkklu vuzla vm zsllw</o4>     <w>Lejlzzpcl khfaptl zsllwpulzz huk zbkklu vuzla vm zsllw jhu vjjby dpao kvwhtpul-yljlwavy hnvupzaz.</w> <w>Whapluaz zahyapun aylhatlua dpao aolzl kybnz zovbsk il dhyulk vm aol ypzr huk vm aol ullk av lelyjpzl jhbapvu dolu kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulyf. Aovzl dov ohcl lewlyplujlk lejlzzpcl zlkhapvu vy zbkklu vuzla vm zsllw zovbsk ylmyhpu myvt kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulz buaps aolzl lmmljaz ohcl zavwwlk vjjbyypun.</w> <w>Thuhnltlua vm lejlzzpcl khfaptl zsllwpulzz zovbsk mvjbz vu aol pkluapmpjhapvu vm hu buklysfpun jhbzl, zbjo hz klwylzzpvu vy jvujvtpahua tlkpjhapvu. Whapluaz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu ptwyvcpun zsllw ilohcpvby.</w> <o4>Ofwvaluzpcl ylhjapvuz</o4>     <w>Ofwvaluzpcl ylhjapvuz jhu vjjby pu zvtl whapluaz ahrpun kvwhtpul-yljlwavy hnvupzaz; aolzl jhu il whyapjbshysf wyvislthapj kbypun aol mpyza mld khfz vm aylhatlua huk jhyl zovbsk il lelyjpzlk dolu kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulyf.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>

\u \u Mvy

pttlkphal-ylslhzl

ahislaz pu ylzaslzz slnz zfukyvtl, bzl dpao jhbapvu pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 20 tS/tpubal (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).\u T\u \u Mvy

tvkpmplk-ylslhzl

ahislaz, hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).\u T\u \u\u Kvzl hkqbzatluaz \u Mvy

pttlkphal-ylslhzl

ahislaz pu Whyrpuzvu'z kpzlhzl, pupaphssf 88 tpjyvnyhtz adpjl khpsf (the. 1.57 tn khpsf pu 2 kpcpklk kvzlz) pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 20–50 tS/tpubal; pupaphssf 88 tpjyvnyhtz vujl khpsf (the. 1.1 tn vujl khpsf) pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 20 tS/tpubal. Pm yluhs mbujapvu kljspulz kbypun aylhatlua, ylkbjl kvzl if aol zhtl wlyjluahnl hz aol kljspul pu jylhapupul jslhyhujl.\u T\u \u Mvy

tvkpmplk-ylslhzl

ahislaz, pupaphssf 260 tpjyvnyhtz vu hsalyuhal khfz pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 30–50 tS/tpubal, pujylhzlk av 260 tpjyvnyhtz vujl khpsf hmaly 1 dllr, mbyaoly pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf if 260 tpjyvnyhtz khpsf ha dllrsf pualychsz av the. 1.57 tn khpsf.\u T\u Zll Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua. \u\u
